Name: Martini Royale
Ingredients: 15 ml Joseph Cartron Double Crème de Cassis de Bourgogne
Top up with Brut champagne/sparkling wine
Instructions: STIR vodka and crème de cassis with ice and strain into chilled glass. TOP with chilled champagne.
Review: The Kir Royale meets the vodkatini in this pink but powerful drink.
History: Created in 2001 by Dick Bradsell at Monte's, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Martini Royale contains 142 calories
